医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
myeloMATCH 计划开始接受急性髓系白血病和骨髓增生异常综合征 (MDS) 患者的招募美国和加拿大的四家领先癌症研究组织宣布开放 myeloMATCH 患者入组，这是一项独特的临床试验组合，旨在测试成人急性髓性白血病 (AML) 或骨髓增生异常综合征 (MDS) 的精准医学治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/myeloMATCH-program-opens-enrollment-for-acute-myeloid-leukemia-and-MDS.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/myeloMATCH-program-opens-enrollment-for-acute-myeloid-leukemia-and-MDS.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=24fdb59e-f7be-45c0-83f6-a6c444d68543 Wed, 23 Oct 2024 22:42:02 -0400 myeloMATCH program opens enrollment for acute myeloid leukemia and MDS
HER2 阳性乳腺癌药物显示出治疗胆管癌的希望根据周四在西班牙巴塞罗那举行的第 36 届 EORTC-NCI-AACR 分子靶标和癌症治疗研讨会上公布的一项患者试验结果，针对 HER2 阳性乳腺癌的药物也可能使一些胆管癌患者受益。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/HER2-postive-breast-cancer-drugs-show-promise-for-bile-duct-cancer-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/HER2-postive-breast-cancer-drugs-show-promise-for-bile-duct-cancer-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5e9541c8-09ad-4fd1-b929-7ea4dfea15c0 Wed, 23 Oct 2024 22:37:09 -0400 HER2-postive breast cancer drugs show promise for bile duct cancer treatment
创建模拟癌症转移的 3D 打印模型科学家们创建了一个 3D 打印模型来模拟刺激癌细胞扩散的特定条件。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/3D-printed-model-created-to-mimic-cancer-metastasis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/3D-printed-model-created-to-mimic-cancer-metastasis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8bdc5a2f-6d0a-4ce4-85f7-c7730655c0ea Wed, 23 Oct 2024 22:32:59 -0400 3D-printed model created to mimic cancer metastasis
针对面临野火健康影响风险的社区发布新指南UL 研究院的化学洞察研究所 (CIRI) 与 UL 标准与合作部合作，为荒地与城市交界处 (WUI) 地区面临火灾风险的社区发布了新指南。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/New-guidance-released-for-communities-at-risk-of-wildfire-health-impacts.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/New-guidance-released-for-communities-at-risk-of-wildfire-health-impacts.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=269d6fc5-44f5-492a-843d-6c5b4f350d6a Wed, 23 Oct 2024 22:27:07 -0400 New guidance released for communities at risk of wildfire health impacts
研究人员创造迷你大脑来研究自闭症并测试新疗法斯克里普斯研究中心的科学家利用从患有罕见和严重的自闭症谱系障碍和智力障碍的患者身上产生的干细胞，培育出个性化的“迷你大脑”（或类器官），以新的细节研究这种疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/Researchers-create-mini-brains-to-study-autism-and-test-new-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/Researchers-create-mini-brains-to-study-autism-and-test-new-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=33f6a6f9-41ee-4708-8e7c-22d96ff7ea8c Wed, 23 Oct 2024 22:23:47 -0400 Researchers create mini-brains to study autism and test new treatments
育儿假的可用性影响年轻人的育儿规范在《英国社会心理学杂志》上发表的研究中，调查人员研究了各国的育儿假政策与年轻人对母亲和父亲之间儿童保育职责划分的社会规范的看法之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/Parental-leave-availability-influences-young-adults-norms-on-childcare.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/Parental-leave-availability-influences-young-adults-norms-on-childcare.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d32281ce-56e1-4fdb-ad15-7850bde504b8 Wed, 23 Oct 2024 22:16:53 -0400
新立场声明主张英国采用永久标准时间英国睡眠协会在《睡眠研究杂志》上发表立场声明，主张废除英国每年两次的时钟变化，恢复永久标准时间（格林威治标准时间）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/New-position-statement-advocates-for-permanent-standard-time-in-the-UK.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/New-position-statement-advocates-for-permanent-standard-time-in-the-UK.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1ccb9ccc-0edb-4331-8137-744644be6d8f Wed, 23 Oct 2024 22:12:40 -0400 New position statement advocates for permanent standard time in the UK
新型设备可以在没有旁观者帮助的情况下拯救服药过量的人阿片类药物流行病每年在美国夺走 70,000 多人的生命，迫切需要采取挽救生命的干预措施。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/Novel-device-may-rescue-people-from-overdose-without-bystander-help.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/Novel-device-may-rescue-people-from-overdose-without-bystander-help.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=be54298e-15e9-4cc4-8225-b81075eb2e66 Wed, 23 Oct 2024 22:07:11 -0400 Novel device may rescue people from overdose without bystander help
中年的健康习惯可以预防神经系统疾病对于中年人来说，血压、血糖和胆固醇等危险因素没有得到很好的控制，再加上不遵循某些健康习惯，包括运动、饮食和睡眠，会增加以后患中风、痴呆或抑郁的风险根据美国神经病学学会医学杂志《神经病学》在线期刊 2024 年 10 月 23 日发表的一项研究显示。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/Healthy-habits-in-middle-age-may-protect-against-neurological-conditions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/Healthy-habits-in-middle-age-may-protect-against-neurological-conditions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=37a6f32b-f63e-4a4d-94cb-f0deb8e65300 Wed, 23 Oct 2024 22:03:09 -0400 Healthy habits in middle age may protect against neurological conditions
睡眠质量差与中年大脑老化加剧有关根据 2024 年 10 月 23 日发表在《神经病学》在线期刊上的一项研究，睡眠质量较差（包括难以入睡或保持睡眠）的中年人在中年后期更容易出现大脑健康状况不佳的迹象。美国神经病学学会杂志。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/Poor-sleep-quality-linked-to-increased-brain-aging-in-middle-age.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/Poor-sleep-quality-linked-to-increased-brain-aging-in-middle-age.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=49b9fc81-4aa7-4e59-9e79-c8b8cc9cd5f7 Wed, 23 Oct 2024 22:01:48 -0400 Poor sleep quality linked to increased brain aging in middle age
